long_description: Compact enough to fit in your pocket and easy to carry to the dog park or trailhead, the OllyDog Sipper dog bowl holds 0.75 liters of water for thirsty dogs. Coated nylon features seamless bathtub-style construction to ensure waterproofness. Foldable stiff sides hold the bowl upright and open. Overstock.
short_description: Compact enough to fit in your pocket and easy to carry to the dog park or trailhead, the OllyDog Sipper dog bowl holds 0.75 liters of water for thirsty dogs.
